data.title: Declan Swans song about Wrexham AFC’s Paul Mullin tops UK comedy chart
data.meta_description: Wrexham band, Declan Swans, have shared their joy as their new track about Paul Mullin has soared to the top of the UK comedy charts.
data.text:
The band is made up of Ben Jones, Mark Jones and Michael Hett and has been together for over 20 years.

And the Swans have enjoyed phenomenal success over the last year or so.

They starred in the hugely-popular Welcome to Wrexham documentary on Disney and their smash hit 'Always Sunny in Wrexham' has become the theme song to a day out at the Racecourse too.

The band is also warming up for the iconic Kings of Leon in their performance at the Racecourse in May.

The Swans' new song, Mullin 10 was released on Thursday, March 16 and within two days the song had reached the number one position in the UK itunes top comedy charts.

The song focuses on Wrexham’s top striker Paul Mullin with lines such as: “Since arriving on the scene - He's our super goal machine.” and “We’ve got Mullin, super Paul Mullin.”

Posting via facebook Declan Swans said: “Thank you all for the unbelievable support for our new tune Mullin 10.

READ MORE: Wrexham star Paul Mullin becomes patron for autism charity

“It currently stands at a staggering NUMBER ONE in the I tunes comedy chart.”

Fans shared their support of the band and new track.

Luke Gallagher said: “There’s no other place than Number One for Declan Swans! You’re exactly where you belong! So chuffed for you guys it’s unreal and what a mega tune Mullin 10 is! Knocked it out the park yet again chaps!”

Andrea Davies said: “You may have had a few more plays after today! I played it about 10 times while making the tea. Think I know all the words already"
